attributes.review: this disgusts me. i open the app expecting to be able to see when the next rally is, but all that shows up is this ugly cheeto man who you can tell has nothing to offer. i did my research and was very offended when i found out what cheeto man stands for. as a member of the latin-american and lgbt community, i am SO offended by what this man is trying to do this this already horrible country. this is utterly disgusting. my pet falcon went and bought me a vegan 100% cheeseburger and this app STOLE MY FOOD! this pig is disgusting.
attributes.title: this is RIDICULOUS

attributes.review:
As you all well know, trump hasnâ€™t been looking to great in his campaign. I do openly say I am a republican, but after this app I would never want to be categorized as a â€œrepublicanâ€ again. This app is a AWFUL campaign tactic for our president. But enough with my wrong decisions, the app: 
First: the app is POORLY laid out and very hard to navigate.
Second: the app has racist posts and remarks ALL OVER IT!
Third: when I downloaded the app on my iPad the pictures were distorted and poorly laid out. 
Fourth: in the â€œchatâ€ very inappropriate things were being said about our former president and even though he was a democratic and will openly say that I enjoyed my country more with him as our leader. 
I now know what mistakes I made voting for him and if I go back I would change my vote no hesitation.
attributes.title: This app disgusts me...

attributes.review: So when I first saw this app in the App Store I was so excited! I could finally support my president. However, upon opening the app I was bombarded with adds to purchase Donâ€™s nude calendar and it really made me sad. I did not know you could make a nude calendar without having anything to show but flab. Persisting through the adds that seemingly would not stop I was introduced to the section where our beloved Cheeto was posing with a spherical globe. Needless to say I would not recommend.
attributes.title: Cheeto Man did us dirty *emotional*
